content: Former time zone **UTC+07:20** is an identifier for a [time offset from UTC](/wiki/UTC_offset) of +07:20. ## History UTC+07:20 was used as [daylight saving time](/wiki/Daylight_saving_time) in [Malaya](/wiki/British_Malaya) and Singapore between 1933 and 1941. On midnight January 1, 1933, people in Malaya and Singapore switched from UTC+07:00 to UTC+07:20 when clocks were turned forward 20 minutes. This time was used until midnight of September 1, 1941 when UTC+07:30 started to be used. - [Singapore Standard Time](/wiki/Singapore_Standard_Time) - [Time in Malaysia](/wiki/Time_in_Malaysia) - UTC+07:30
title: UTC+07:20
